Operation 'oauth2.tokeninfo' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, vague_description, missing_input_details, missing_output_details, unclear_purpose, poor_ai_interpretability. Original description is extremely vague with no summary. Added clarity about the operation's purpose (token validation and metadata retrieval), expected inputs (token parameter), outputs (token metadata), and use case context for AI agents to understand when to invoke this operation.

data.description_suggestion: Validates and retrieves metadata about an OAuth2 access token. Accepts a token parameter and returns token information including user ID, scope, expiration time, and token type. Useful for verifying token validity and permissions before making authenticated API requests.
data.reasoning: Original description is extremely vague with no summary. Added clarity about the operation's purpose (token validation and metadata retrieval), expected inputs (token parameter), outputs (token metadata), and use case context for AI agents to understand when to invoke this operation.

message: Operation 'oauth2.userinfo.get' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, vague_description, missing_input_details, missing_output_details, unclear_purpose, poor_ai_interpretability. Original description lacks specificity and context. Added authentication requirement, return type reference (Userinfo schema), specific fields returned, and clarification that it uses the authenticated user's access token. This helps AI agents understand authentication prerequisites and expected response structure.

data.description_suggestion: Retrieves the profile information of the authenticated end-user. Requires OAuth2 authentication. Returns a Userinfo object containing user details such as ID, email, name, and profile picture URL. This endpoint uses the user's access token to identify and return their profile data.
data.reasoning: Original description lacks specificity and context. Added authentication requirement, return type reference (Userinfo schema), specific fields returned, and clarification that it uses the authenticated user's access token. This helps AI agents understand authentication prerequisites and expected response structure.

message: Operation 'oauth2.userinfo.v2.me.get' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, vague_description, missing_input_details, missing_output_details, unclear_purpose, poor_ai_interpretability. Original description is identical to the v1 endpoint but lacks version context and clarification about the '/me' semantics. Added version context (v2 endpoint), explicit clarification that '/me' refers to the authenticated user's own profile, and authentication requirements. This helps AI agents distinguish between v1 and v2 endpoints and understand the semantic meaning of the '/me' path parameter.

data.description_suggestion: Retrieves the profile information of the currently authenticated user via the v2 endpoint. Requires OAuth2 authentication. Returns a Userinfo object containing user details such as ID, email, name, and profile picture. The '/me' path segment indicates this always returns the authenticated user's own profile, not another user's data.
data.reasoning: Original description is identical to the v1 endpoint but lacks version context and clarification about the '/me' semantics. Added version context (v2 endpoint), explicit clarification that '/me' refers to the authenticated user's own profile, and authentication requirements. This helps AI agents distinguish between v1 and v2 endpoints and understand the semantic meaning of the '/me' path parameter.
